sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"使困惑，迷惑，糊涂，伤脑筋"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: puzzle, bewilder, confuse, embarrass, perplex, baffle, confound, distract
means: puzzle ： 侧重使人难于理解、困惑、伤脑筋。
bewilder ： 语气强烈，指因迷不解或惊愕而慌乱，不知所措，无法清醒地思考。
confuse ： 语气较弱，指由于混淆、混乱而糊涂。
embarrass ： 常指因处境或困难问题而感到窘迫、局促不安或焦急而不知所措。
perplex ： 除困惑外，还含焦虑或缺乏把握之意，因而难于作出决定，无从下手处理。
baffle ： 语气最强，多指遇见奇怪情景或复杂困难情况时所产生的惶恐困惑心理。
confound ： 常指人惊慌失措和狼狈不堪。
distract ： 主要用于注意力分散、思想矛盾或过分激动时产生的昏乱。

sentence.Network_en: There was nothing at all in this miserable place to distract him.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个鬼地方根本没有什么东西可以让他分心。

sentence.Network_en: You distract me. I've been distracted since the moment I met you. Because all I can think about is how much I want to kiss you.
sentence.Network_cn: 你害我分心。从遇见你的那一刻起，你就让我分心。因为我的脑海里满满都是想吻你的冲动。

sentence.Network_en: She jabbered away, trying to distract his attention.
sentence.Network_cn: 她喋喋不休, 想分散他的注意力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 分字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 分校〖 abranchschool,etc〗 分心〖 divertone'sattention;distract〗 分星掰两〖 clear;indetail〗.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... detractor n 毁谤者 distract v 分散；使混乱 distracted a 心烦意乱的.
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... dissolve 分离，溶解 distract 分心，转移 dispense 分配.
2012年中考英语高频词汇_百度文库 ... distance n. 距离,远处 distract v. 分散注意力 documentary a. 有文件的；有证件的.

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... distract v 分散；使混乱 distracted a 心烦意乱的 extract v 抽出；提炼出.
求关于“大学生就业问题”的英语作文 ... edge( 保持竟争地位). distractions( 分心，干扰). swarm( 蜂拥).
《Friends》词汇表B ... repeats n. 重复, 反复 distraction n. 娱乐, 分心, 分心的事物 poltergeist n. 敲击作响闹恶作剧的鬼.
distracter 误选项distractibility 分心作用distractibili共页 21

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'pull in different directions'): from Latin distract- 'drawn apart', from the verb distrahere, from dis- 'apart' + trahere 'to draw, drag'

entry.def: If something distracts you or your attention from something, it takes your attention away from it.

example.ex: Tom admits that playing video games sometimes distracts him from his homework...
example.tran: 汤姆承认玩电子游戏有时会使他无心做作业。

example.ex: Don't let yourself be distracted by fashionable theories...
example.tran: 不要让自己被流行的理论分散了注意力。

means.word_mean: 1. draw someone's attention away from something;
2. disturb in mind or make uneasy or cause to be worried or alarmed;

sentences.sentence: "She was rather perturbed by the news that her father was seriously ill"

auth_sentence.content: How will we distract the public from impending gloom?
auth_sentence.res_content: How will we distract the public from impending gloom?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How will we distract the public from impending gloom?

auth_sentence.content: But not the power to distract, she says.
auth_sentence.res_content: But not the power to distract, she says.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But not the power to distract, she says.

auth_sentence.content: If you sense his frustrations rising, distract him.
auth_sentence.res_content: If you sense his frustrations rising, distract him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If you sense his frustrations rising, distract him.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+advantage优点,有利条件→n.不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除

Sentence.sentence: boys can focus on their lessons without being distracted
The distribution of iPhones among students has raised concerns that they will further distract students from class participation.
further distract students from class participation

means.word_mean: 使(人)分心, 分散(注意力)

sentences.en: Noise outside distracted her mind from her studies.
sentences.cn: 门外的噪音使她心神不宁, 无法集中注意力学习。

sentences.en: He was distracted with an unhappy love affair.

jushi.english: He was distracted with〔by〕 an unhappy love affair.
Noise outside distracted her mind from her studies.
jushi.chinese: 门外的噪音使她心神不宁,无法集中注意力学习。

jushi.english: The celebrations distracted public attention from the government's problems.
jushi.chinese: 庆祝活动分散了公众对政府存在的问题的注意。
